article_title: Repaired ceiling could bring aerial gymnastics to city’s Youth Center
article_text:

og.description: The gymnasium ceiling in the Hudson Youth Center is in bad shape. Though there’s money to fix it in the city budget, the summer has come and gone, and the work has not been done.
